subject: Arabic Language

overview.description: Comprehensive Arabic language curriculum integrating classical Arabic scholarship with modern scientific and technical terminology, emphasizing Quranic Arabic, Islamic texts, and contemporary Arabic usage in academic and scientific contexts

learning_objectives: Master classical Arabic grammar, syntax, and morphology
Develop proficiency in reading and understanding Quranic and Islamic texts
Acquire modern Arabic scientific and technical vocabulary
Apply Arabic language skills to Islamic scholarship and contemporary texts
Integrate Arabic language learning with STEM subjects and Islamic studies

units.title: Classical Arabic Grammar and Quranic Language
learning_outcomes: Understand grammatical structures in Quranic Arabic
Apply grammatical knowledge to text analysis and comprehension
Develop skills in Arabic linguistic analysis

lessons.title: Advanced Arabic Morphology and Word Formation
objectives: Understand Arabic root system and word derivation patterns
Apply morphological rules to form and analyze words
Recognize morphological patterns in Quranic and classical texts

activities.description: Analyze word formation patterns and root derivations
Practice recognizing and applying morphological patterns
Apply morphological knowledge to analyze Quranic verses

cross_curricular_connections: Quran Studies: Linguistic analysis of Quranic texts

units.title: Arabic Scientific and Technical Terminology
learning_outcomes: Master Arabic scientific vocabulary across STEM fields
Apply Arabic scientific language to academic contexts
Connect classical and modern Arabic scientific usage

lessons.title: Mathematics and Science Vocabulary in Arabic
objectives: Learn Arabic mathematical and scientific terminology
Understand scientific concept expression in Arabic
Apply Arabic scientific vocabulary in academic contexts

activities.description: Study Arabic scientific and mathematical terminology systematically
Practice expressing scientific concepts in Arabic
Read modern Arabic scientific texts and articles
Practice translating scientific concepts between Arabic and English

units.title: Classical Islamic Texts and Scholarly Writing
learning_outcomes: Read and analyze classical Islamic scholarly texts
Understand different styles of Islamic scholarly writing
Develop skills in Arabic academic writing and composition
Apply textual analysis skills to Islamic literature

lessons.title: Reading Classical Islamic Scientific and Philosophical Texts
objectives: Read and comprehend classical Islamic scientific works
Understand scholarly Arabic writing styles and conventions
Analyze arguments and methodologies in classical texts

activities.description: Read selections from classical Islamic scientific and philosophical works
Analyze linguistic features and scholarly writing styles
Discuss content, arguments, and methodologies in the texts
Connect classical insights to contemporary knowledge

resources: Classical Islamic scientific texts (Al-Biruni, Ibn Sina, etc.)
cross_curricular_connections: History: Historical scientific and philosophical development

units.title: Contemporary Arabic and Academic Communication
learning_outcomes: Develop proficiency in modern standard Arabic communication
Master Arabic academic writing and research skills
Understand contemporary Arabic media and discourse
Apply Arabic language skills to current academic and professional contexts

lessons.title: Arabic Academic Writing and Research Skills
objectives: Develop skills in Arabic academic writing and composition
Learn to conduct research using Arabic sources
Master Arabic citation and documentation styles

activities.description: Practice Arabic academic writing with focus on structure and style
Conduct research project using Arabic academic sources
Prepare and deliver academic presentations in Arabic
Peer review and feedback on Arabic academic writing

cross_curricular_connections: Research Methods: Academic research in Arabic
Multiple Subjects: Arabic language application across disciplines

speaking_proficiency: Scientific and technical discussion in Arabic
reading_skills: Modern Arabic scientific and academic texts
writing_abilities: Modern Arabic academic and scientific writing

formative_assessments: Writing practice and peer review sessions

supplementary_materials: Audio materials for pronunciation and listening

career_connections: Arabic language education and curriculum development

cultural_integration.islamic_heritage: Connection to Islamic literary and scholarly traditions
cultural_integration.arab_culture: Understanding of Arabic cultural contexts and expressions
cultural_integration.global_arabic: Awareness of Arabic language diversity across regions
cultural_integration.contemporary_relevance: Application of Arabic skills to modern contexts and needs
